Configuring BLAST databases

12 months ago

BLAST databases are configured in the start-up configuration of SATurn. To add or remove BLAST databases follow the instructions below and restart the SATurn application.

Adding a BLAST database

  1. Open $SATURN/build/services/ServicesLocalLite.json in your editor of choice
  2. Find the BLAST_DB configuration section and add a block as shown below

    "Constructs (DNA)" :{ "dbtype": "nucl", "dbpath": "databases/constructs_nucleotide.fasta", "prog": "blastn" }

    dbtype: "nucl" for DNA or "prot" for Protein
    prog: "blastn" for DNA or "blastp" for Protein
    dbpath: file path to BLASTDB (see Creating a BLASTDB) - can be relative

Remove a BLAST database

  1. Open $SATURN/build/services/ServicesLocalLite.json in your editor of choice
  2. Find the BLAST_DB configuration section and add a block as shown below
  3. Remove the block for the database you want to remove
